column1: Uchi////And then the finale was the dessert of fried milk
column2: the much-hyped (here on Yelp) and absolutely dazzling dessert. What we liked most about it was that it was just sweet enough (but not too sweet)
column3: and the blend of the slightly warm chocolate milk cookie
column4: the mound of corn flakes and the cold milk ice cream just about covered every flavor note. I am not exaggerating when I say that I licked that particular plate clean
column5: literally at the end! I can hardly think of any dessert that I have eaten in the recent past that is as good as this one.
